intro: Epidendrum goniorhachis, commonly known as the golden lip orchid, is a tropical epiphytic orchid native to Central and South America. It features long, arching stems that bear numerous showy, golden-yellow flowers with a distinctive red lip. The plant has linear,革质 (leathery) leaves that are arranged in a rosette pattern along the stem. It thrives in bright, indirect light and requires high humidity and well-draining potting media. Epidendrum goniorhachis is prized for its ornamental value and is relatively easy to cultivate in a home setting.
